Meriden.Kensington Soldier's Monument: The Kensington Soldiers' Monument is a historic war memorial located at 371 Percival Road, on the grounds of the Kensington Congregational Church in Berlin, Connecticut. Erected in 1863, it is one of the oldest memorials to the American Civil War in the United States, and the first to be erected in Connecticut. It is a modest brownstone obelisk, with an accompanying cannon.
